com.bandyer.core_av.view

Class BandyerView

  • com.bandyer.core_av.view.BandyerView

  • public class BandyerView

    Custom view which extends FrameLayout and is used to render the stream of the subscriber and publisher

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentScaleType

        public ScaleType getCurrentScaleType()

        current view-port scale type, by default is BALANCED

      • setCurrentScaleType

        public void setCurrentScaleType(ScaleType p)

        current view-port scale type, by default is BALANCED

      • bringToFront

        public void bringToFront(boolean bringToFront)

        Method used to put the view above others.

        Calling this method multiple times has the same result as calling @see SurfaceView.setZOrderMediaOverlay

        Calling this overrides any previous call to BandyerView.putAboveEverything.

        Parameters:
        bringToFront - true if the view should be on front, false otherwise
        See Also:
        SurfaceView.setZOrderMediaOverlay, BandyerView.putAboveEverything

      • putAboveEverything

        public void putAboveEverything(boolean putAboveEverything)

        Method used to put the view above everything

        Calling this method multiple times has the same result as calling SurfaceView.setZOrderOnTop

        Calling this overrides any previous call to BandyerView.bringToFront.

        Parameters:
        putAboveEverything - true if the view should be above everything, false otherwise
        See Also:
        SurfaceView.setZOrderOnTop, BandyerView.bringToFront

      • play

        public void play(Stream stream)

        Method to play the stream on the view

        Parameters:
        stream - Stream to render

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType(ScaleType scaleType)

        Method to change the scale type of the preview

        Parameters:
        scaleType - scale type by default BALANCED

      • audioEnabled

        public void audioEnabled(boolean enabled)

        Method to enable/disable the audio

        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable,false otherwise

      • videoEnabled

        public void videoEnabled(boolean enabled)

        Method to enable/disable the video

        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable,false otherwise
